overview: A story about the love and subsequent life story of agronom Elmer Oras and Margi Kaski and their son.  The story has its origins just before the Winter War. After a brief encounter, both fell in love. As a result of this love affair, Margit gets pregnant  Soon the war breaks out and Elmer has to go the front. As the war goes on, Elmer does not return from a patrol mission behind the enemy lines.  After the war times are hard for Margit and his fatherless son.
title: Lähellä syntiä
